"You are on a quest! If you think you've reached the location the clue is referring to, click the "Found It" button and the GPS on your phone will let you know if you've reach it and give you the next clue! If you’re stuck, click on "HINT" to help you out!"

"Explore Carleton’s history! Walk around the campus to see interesting facts about buildings and places of interest based on your GPS location. Tap on a marker to view more info. \nTo see images others have uploaded near your current location, tap on “Get Nearby Memories”. To add your own memory, tap on “Add Memory” on the "Nearby Memories" popup"

"Ready for a Carleton adventure? Embark on a quest using the clues provided! After figuring out what location on campus each clue refers to, walk to that location. The GPS on your phone will let you know if you are at the correct spot and give you the next clue. If you’re stuck, use the Hints provided to help you out!"
